ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Looking for PoP
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey Rox, I m not quite sure I understand exactly what you are looking for but if you are in Freeport and looking for the book to port yourself then you need to
ygData.messageBody:
Hey Rox,
I'm not quite sure I understand exactly what you are looking for
but if you are in Freeport and looking for the book to port yourself
then you need to be in West Freeport. Go out the main gates and then
follow the wall to your left. This will take you to a hidden entryway
along the North wall and the book is located in there. It took me a
while to find it myself! Lol

_______________________________
/
/ North wall and entryway
/
/
|
|
| Two cacti on a mound
|
|

Hope this little diagram helps some.

C-ya!
Durgaa

-----Original Message-----

From: "longdstud <longdstud@...>" <longdstud@...>
Subject: Hi

My name is Rox i'm a Iksar monk I have been looking for pop does
anyone know where it is I have looked in all of the freeports even
the one in kunark and I can't find it does it connect to the dreaded
plains?

Rox datcradle
